title: Car and Driver October 2008
description:
CAR and DRIVER occupies a special place in the world of automotive magazines, a position earned by a unique combination of dedication, style, technical expertise, and the ability to put our readers in the driverÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s seat. Once theyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re in that seat, we do our best to see that they learn something of use. And that they enjoy themselves.

Each month, CAR and DRIVER presents the latest new cars, vans, SUVÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s, and pickups ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ imports and domestics ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ with an emphasis on those cars heaven-sent for the man or woman who knows the rewards that an outstanding automobile can confer on its driver. We examine in detail new technology, new directions, and new ideas put forth by the automobile industry. 

In this issue:

The Best Car for $25,000
With 25 grand in your pocket and fun a prime motivator, what do you go for: a modestly sporting new car or a flamboyantly exotic used one?

Chevrolet Corvette ZR1
A car nobody needs hits a track nobody knows for a ride nobody will forget.

Elephant vs. Ferrari
Two 612 Scagliettis roam the subcontinent as Ferrari explores a promising new market.

The Evora Has Landed
Lotus produces a mid-engined two-plus-two to do battle with Porsche&#039;s finest.
